page.title: 16LANDSCAPE. OUT AND ABOUT(3)
page.content: By now we were beginning to feel rather weary as we had been walking for some considerable time. We decided to turn for home.Fortunately we did not have to retrace our steps, but could go back by a more direct route. This took us close to a number of factories which have developed on this part of the heath. One of them is quite large, the export division of Max Factor. Another, with quite an imposing front, makes components for the aircraft industry. We were now nearing the end of our journey as familiar landmarks came into sight. What an enjoyable day we had had and how pleased we would be to see mum and have a nice cup of tea.
